thread.title: Stream Skyway Man Seen Comin’ From A Mighty Eye
thread.title_full: Stream Skyway Man Seen Comin’ From A Mighty Eye

author: Pranav Trewn
title: Stream Skyway Man Seen Comin’ From A Mighty Eye
text: Pranav Trewn @PTrewn | 9:24 am Share < br />this article: James Wallace’s new album as Skyway Man, Seen Comin’ From A Mighty Eye , was recorded at the famed Spacebomb Studios, the Richmond institution led by Matthew E. White and responsible for the orchestral pomp of Natalie Prass’ incredible debut album . You can hear the Spacebomb players’ signature sonic heft behind Wallace’s folk-soul compositions, which reach out towards the stars yet are distinctly of this earth, sounding like your feet sinking into the soil and crossing through into the cosmos. There’s a lot to dig into on this thing, from rumbling psychedelia to seismic Americana, yet it’s uniquely approachable through the sheer pleasantness of the arrangements. We premiered the spectral single “ Creation // Someday ” and its video last month, and now we present the entire album ahead of its official release this Friday. Listen below. Seen Comin' From a Mighty Eye by Skyway Man Seen Comin’ From A Mighty Eye is out 2/24. Pre-order it at PledgeMusic .
